scripts.test: pnpm -C ../sdk run build:check:fresh || pnpm -C ../sdk run build && USE_RELAY_SERVER=1 playwright test --reporter=line
scripts.test:lite: pnpm -C ../sdk run build:check:fresh || pnpm -C ../sdk run build && USE_RELAY_SERVER=1 playwright test -c playwright.lite.config.ts --reporter=line
scripts.test:inline: pnpm -C ../sdk run build:check:fresh || pnpm -C ../sdk run build && USE_RELAY_SERVER=1 playwright test --reporter=line
scripts.test:unit: pnpm -C ../sdk run build:check:fresh || pnpm -C ../sdk run build && playwright test ./unit --reporter=line
